rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall that aligns with the north-facing requirement and follows Vastu principles.
Open space that integrates the living and dining areas; designed in Art Deco style with geometric patterns.
A master bedroom featuring Art Deco elements and large windows to enhance natural light.
Second bedroom with a balanced layout and Art Deco design features.
A compact guest bedroom that adheres to Vastu and Art Deco design principles.
A modern kitchen designed with Art Deco style and functional layout in line with Vastu guidelines.
Small utility space for cleaning and storage, integrated within the ground floor plan.
A versatile study or workshop area that can serve as an additional workspace.

openings.description: Large door aligning with the north entrance requirement and ensuring proper energy flow according to Vastu.
Entrance to a two-car garage, conveniently placed at the west side of the property.
